name: Carol

topics.topic_text: How much for a room?
topics.response_text: Huh? Oh... 120 caps... I guess.

topics.topic_text: No, thanks.
topics.response_text: Okay, then.

topics.topic_text: Actually, I don't have 120 caps.
topics.response_text: Oh. Sorry... there's not really anything I can do. I have to make money, you know.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: What? Oh... I'm sorry... I was just thinking about my poor Gob. Did you need something?

topics.topic_text: Sounds like a normal guy.
topics.response_text: Yes. He's much nicer than some of my guests.

topics.topic: MS14CrowleyWhat can you tell me about Mister Crowley?
topics.topic_text: Do you know Mister Crowley?
topics.response_text: The back room renter? Oh, he's a swell guest. So polite too. Never gets mad at anyone.

topics.topic: MS14PersuadeCrowleyCome on. You can tell me. Ahzrukhal said so. <Lie.>
topics.topic_text: So he doesn't do anything strange?
topics.response_text: Well, he does keep talking about how he's going to make his fortune soon.

topics.topic_text: SpeechChallengeFailure
topics.response_text: Well, I never! You, sir, are no gentleman.

topics.topic_text: Have you ever heard of a guy named Gob?
topics.response_text: Gob? Yes, of course!{Her mood brightens a little.}

topics.topic_text: He was up in Megaton. I'm afraid that he's dead.
topics.response_text: No! Not Gob... I'm... I'm sorry... I need some time alone...

topics.topic_text: He was up in Megaton. At least he was until I killed him.
topics.response_text: You... you what?

topics.topic_text: You're taking Greta's death really hard, aren't you?
topics.response_text: We've been together longer than you've been alive.

topics.topic_text: How did you end up here?
topics.response_text: Oh, that's such a long story. You couldn't possibly want to hear about that.

topics.topic_text: No, Carol. I'd love to hear your story.
topics.response_text: Well, okay... but it's nothing special.

topics.topic_text: See, and you said you weren't interesting.
topics.response_text: You tell the same stories for 200 years, you'll feel pretty uninteresting too.

topics.topic_text: Do you remember the day the war started?
topics.response_text: I do... I was in a shelter with my father when the bombs hit. In DC, we had the luxury of getting a warning after the west coast was... gone...

topics.topic_text: What was the Wasteland like after the war?
topics.response_text: The city was on fire for weeks... maybe months, I don't know. I hid down here in the museum... it was the closest building to the shelter I was in.

topics.topic_text: So, how did you end up as a Ghoul?
topics.response_text: I don't know how it happens. Doctor Barrows says it was radiation. All I know is that people kept showing up here in the museum.

topics.topic_text: You know, you're right. I don't.
topics.response_text: See, I knew it. I'm really just a boring old Ghoul, I promise.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Underworld?
topics.response_text: I've been here since we founded the town. Before that, well, life out in the Wastes wasn't very pleasant for us.

conversation.response_text: You come back real soon now!
Too bad about Crowley. I heard Tenpenny put out a contract on him.
Oh, don't worry about me. You just go enjoy your drink.
What? Oh, I'm fine, Greta. I'm just fine, miles away, you know?
Oh, the customers are fine. So long as they've got you to being them food and drinks, they couldn't care less.
What now? Oh, I'm sorry Greta, I didn't see you there... did you need something?
Oh, Greta, you worry too much. I'm fine, I'm fine. Just have a lot on my mind. It'll pass. Nothing to worry about.

description:
Carol is a 226 year-old Ghoul Female.

A 226-year-old female ghoul who survived the Great War by hiding in the Museum of History in Washington D.C. After the war, she eventually settled in Underworld, a ghoul community beneath the Museum of History. Despite her traumatic experiences, Carol maintains a pleasant disposition and is well-liked in Underworld. She is the proprietor of Carol's Place, a bed and breakfast that has become a popular gathering spot for ghouls.

Carol's Personality: Generally cheerful and optimistic, but can be sarcastic and cynical when it comes to humans, referring to them as 'smoothskins.' Carol values companionship and has created a family with Greta and Gob. Despite being a ghoul, she takes pride in her appearance, often wearing a sundress. She has a dry sense of humor and enjoys telling stories about her experiences before and after the Great War.

Carol's Backstory: Born in 2051 in Washington D.C., Carol witnessed the destruction of the city during the Great War in 2077. She survived by hiding in the Museum of History, listening to the chaos unfold outside its walls for weeks. After the initial danger passed, she lived in the ruins of the capital for several decades before finding her way to Underworld, the ghoul community beneath the Museum. Around 2217, she met Greta, and the two began a relationship. Together, they fulfilled Carol's lifelong dream of opening a bed and breakfast, which became Carol's Place in Underworld. Over the years, they 'adopted' Gob, a younger ghoul, and have built a life together in the ghoul community.
